author: David Uzondu
title: Expert says XChat 'encryption' is misleading, since Elon Musk can still read your messages
description: X's new encrypted chat feature, XChat, has raised concerns among experts over the fact that the company can still access your chats, despite claims of "Bitcoin-style" encryption.
content:
